lessons.japanese: ７カ国の首脳がその会議に出席した。
lessons.indonesian: The top leaders of seven countries attended the meeting.

lessons.japanese: サミットって、主要国首脳会議のことなんですか？
lessons.indonesian: By summit, do you mean the Group of Eight?

lessons.japanese: サミットって、主要国首脳会議のことなんですか？
lessons.indonesian: By summit, do you mean the Group of Seven?

lessons.japanese: 与党の首脳たちは政治改革法案で知恵をしぼっています。
lessons.indonesian: Party leaders are hammering out a proposal for political reform.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは遅くまで首脳会談を続けた。
lessons.indonesian: They carried on the summit conference till late.

lessons.japanese: 先進７カ国の首脳は２０００年、沖縄に集まる。
lessons.indonesian: The leaders of seven industrial democracies will meet in Okinawa in 2000.

lessons.japanese: 首脳会談は世界平和に貢献した。
lessons.indonesian: The summit conference made a contribution to the peace of the world.

lessons.japanese: 首脳会談は世界平和に貢献した。
lessons.indonesian: The summit conference contributed to world peace.

lessons.japanese: 首脳会談は世界中で同時に放送される予定だ。
lessons.indonesian: The summit talks are to be broadcast simultaneously throughout the world.

lessons.japanese: 首脳会談のことは世界中で放映される予定だ。
lessons.indonesian: The summit talks are to be broadcast around the globe.

lessons.japanese: 首脳会議は世界平和に貢献した。
lessons.indonesian: The summit conference was held for world peace.

lessons.japanese: 首脳たちは経済成長に障害となるものを排除しようとしています。
lessons.indonesian: Leaders are trying to do away with impediments to economic growth.

lessons.japanese: ７カ国の首脳がその会議に出席した。
lessons.indonesian: The top leaders of seven countries attended the meeting.

lessons.japanese: 首脳たちは経済成長に障害となるものを排除しようとしています。
lessons.indonesian: Leaders are trying to do away with impediments to economic growth.

lessons.japanese: 首脳会議は世界平和に貢献した。
lessons.indonesian: The summit conference was held for world peace.
